summary: Tested icon animations, admin color picker, and ESLint fixes. All core features working: animated icons on listing detail with green color (#2E7D32), admin panel accessible with icon grid, ESLint TypeScript parsing FIXED (was using cached config). Minor design observation: animations are using React Native's Animated API which works on web but transform state is not visible in DOM after completion.

issues: Edit modal opens from bottom like mobile sheet - consider side panel for desktop

critical_code_review_comments: AnimatedIconBox component (lines 148-195) correctly implements bounce animation with Animated.spring (friction: 4, tension: 100)
Staggered delay of 80ms per icon creates nice cascade effect
getIconColorForAttribute function (lines 134-152) returns custom color if set, defaults to #2E7D32
Color picker UI has 8 predefined swatches + hex input field
ESLint config was FIXED - removed duplicate parser config that conflicted with expo config
context_for_next_testing_agent: Icon animations implemented using React Native Animated API with spring physics. Admin color picker at /admin/icons works - has 8 color swatches and hex input. ESLint TypeScript parsing fixed by simplifying config to only use expo config (which already includes TypeScript parser). Test listing: a43909ba-6022-430f-8170-b1af696d89da

verified_features.icon_bounce_animation: PASS - AnimatedIconBox with Animated.spring implemented correctly
verified_features.desktop_icon_display: PASS - 89 green elements, 37 light green backgrounds
verified_features.admin_icons_page: PASS - Page loads, shows icon grid with edit/delete buttons
verified_features.color_picker_ui_code: PASS - 8 color swatches + hex input in code at lines 560-601
verified_features.default_green_color: PASS - #2E7D32 applied when no custom color set
verified_features.eslint_typescript_fix: PASS - No parsing errors after config simplification

eslint_fix_details.issue: TypeScript parsing error - 'interface' is reserved keyword
eslint_fix_details.root_cause: Custom parser config in eslint.config.js was conflicting with expo-config-expo/flat which already configures @typescript-eslint/parser
eslint_fix_details.fix: Removed duplicate languageOptions.parser config, kept only expo config + ignores
eslint_fix_details.verification: yarn eslint app/admin/icons.tsx now passes with only warnings (unused vars)
